recipe.title: Tahini, Date & Cacao Cookies
recipe.introduction: Nothing beats a cuppa and a bit of homemaking! These cookies are super delicious and a good source of protein, fibre and energy giving B vitamins.
recipe.description: Nothing beats a cuppa and a bit of homemaking! These cookies are super delicious and a good source of protein, fibre and energy giving B vitamins.
ingredients: 10g buckwheat flour (or any gluten free flour)
method: Mix everything together in a bowl
Divide mixture into 16 even sized balls (about a tablespoon each)
Flatten with a fork *Bake on a lined baking tray at 200 gas 6 for 8 minutes.
Eat as quick as you can!
